name: Million Money Drop
description:
Feel like in tv and win a million!

Million Money Drop is a video quiz in which you can win a virtual million, just answer 8 questions correctly.

Game rules:
1. The goal of the game is to get as much money as possible after going through 8 questions, losing all money means the end of the game.
2. To put money from the main pot, press on the monitors you want to bet on.
3. Remember to keep one empty trap.
4. Money can be withdrawn from the trap by pressing the main cash pool.
5. After finishing the time, the money that was left in the main pot is lost.
6. You can stop the countdown with the button to speed up the game.

The main elements of the game:
- Over 1,000 questions
- 6 language versions
- Ability to speed up time
- Calming music
- No ads
- Scoreboard
